author: Simon Difford
description: The addition of bitter liqueur and aromatic bitters to the classic 1930 recipe from The Savoy Cocktail Book, lifts the Marmalade Cocktail to a new level of bittersweet complexity.
name: English Marmalade
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR marmalade with gin in base of shaker so as to dissolve marmalade
ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
